page.title: 03BERWICK LIFEBOAT RESCUES
page.content: This year 1985,they were called out to rescue a man in a van on the causeway to Holy Island.The van had been trapped by the tide coming in and had been surrounded by water.When the lifeboat reached the stranded van they found that the driver was fast asleep inside and wasn't aware that he needed rescuing.They banged on the side to wake him up and he was surprised to find himself surrounded by sea and lifeboatmen.They also rescue holiday makers blowing out to sea on airbeds and falling down cliffs.They rescue surfboarders and fishermen or sailors who need hospital treatment.They once rescued the lifeboat's own doctor whose engine failed when he was out fishing.They enjoyed that.Sometimes they need the coastguard or helicopter to help them. Karen.Andrea.Katie.Lisa.
